message: Hi Bob, I'm selling this great product and I think you'd really like it. My asking price is $175. Let me know what you think!
Thank you for offering the product, Alice. I appreciate your suggestion, but my budget allows me to spend no more than $100 on this item. Would you consider lowering the price?

Bob, thanks for your counteroffer. I understand your budget constraints.  While I can't go as low as $100, I'm willing to come down to $125 to make this work. This would still allow me to make a fair profit.  What do you think?
